Carlos is planting a lemon tree. The tree will cost $90 to plant. Each year it will grow 7 lemons, which he can sell for $1.5 each. It costs $3 a year to water and feed the tree. How many years will it take before he starts earning money on the lemon tree?
Now please strictly answer this question in the json format: "{"reasons": "(a string of your reasoning process)", "answer": "(a pure numeric value without unit)"}"

{"reasons": "Let's assume x is the number of years it will take before Carlos starts earning money on the lemon tree. The total cost of planting the tree is $90. Each year, Carlos earns $1.5 for each lemon and spends $3 on watering and feeding the tree. So, the total earnings after x years will be 7 * 1.5 * x = 10.5x. The total expenses after x years will be 3 * x = 3x. Carlos will start earning money when his total earnings exceed his total expenses. Therefore, the equation is 10.5x > 3x + 90. Solving this equation will give us the value of x.", "answer": "10"}
